title: Ariadne Loveseat
description:
The Ariadne loveseat is fit for royalty! The platinum finish of the wooden frame complements the lustrous upholstery over button-tufted seatback and armrests. Carved flourishes crown the arched seatbacks and extend down the molding around the high shelter armrests. Accent pillows with floral patterns are included.
